| 随着藏学研究的深入开展,国内外人士及更多的学者对西藏
的历史、宗教、文化、建筑、风俗习惯等诸多方面的兴趣与日俱
增。藏学与汉学、蒙古学、突厥学、敦煌学一样,已经成为研究
中华传统文化不可缺少的一个重要组成部分。同时,由于藏学研
究的国际化及大量的藏学书籍不断地被翻译介绍出去,为了加强
学术交流及资源共享,藏学资料的翻译工作量成倍增加,参与藏
学资料翻译工作的人员也与日俱增。在翻译过程中,翻译工作者
们深感对博大精深的藏文化了解的不足及驾驶两种、甚至三种语
言之能力的欠缺。而目前,我国图书市场上可供参考的有关藏学
的专业词典极为有限,特别是汉英、英汉藏学翻译方面的词典更
是凤毛麟角。
| 藏学是一门十分深奥、独具特色的学科,词汇的翻译不仅要
理解其丰富的内涵,还须选择词意俱佳的表述方法。许多翻译工
作者和学者在向国内外读者介绍西藏或藏学研究成果的过程中常
常在藏学术语的翻译上感到力不从心。1997年外文出版社出版
了我编纂的《汉英·英汉藏学词汇》。它填补了藏学翻译上的一
个小小空白,成了当时从事藏学资料翻译工作者的参考依据。由
于我当时的水平所限及时间紧迫,现在看来那部小词典存有许多
欠缺之处。光阴荏苒,十几年已过,我更加感到那部小词典的词
汇容量不足,编排不够严谨、科学。因此,我对二十余年翻译藏
学书籍和资料的过程中有意识地收集和积累的词汇进行了精选,
并从国内外出版的词典中搜集和摘选一些常用的藏学词汇。同
1 4-01
-19 2017/1","
timum
…… |uris

前言
ERAMAHAMAHAAAAAAB
I
威的有关藏学翻译的双语词典。
国藏学出版社的鼎力相助。
六个附录,作为对正文的补充。
地对本词典做出纠正和补充,使之日臻完善,成为更全面、更权
界、翻译界、藏学专家和学者不吝赐教。我也更希望他们能不断
闻于本人水平有限,错误和疏漏之处在所难免,恳请藏学
梵文方面的帮助。我还要感谢中国西藏文化保护与发展协会及中
并给予帮助的朋友。特别是南加才让先生及葛维钧先生在藏文和
对等方面给予我的帮助。同时,还要感谢一直关心我的编纂工作
在编纂本词典的过程中,我感谢我的家人在录入、扫描和校
一览表的附录形式出现,以免正文部分过于臃赘。本字典共有十
译,因此其中出现的藏文和梵文均以梵汉词汇一览表和汉藏词汇
大部分,可以互相参照使用。由于本词典侧重于汉英英汉翻
史、文化、建筑、风俗习惯等诸多方面,正文分为汉英英汉两
本词典共收入有关藏学词条近万条,涉及西藏的宗教、历
些帮助,特编纂《汉英- 英汉藏学翻译词典》,以缠读者。
一些常用的藏学词汇囊括其中。为了能给翻译和研究人员提供一
时,利用我有限的藏文水平,还从藏英词典中进行挑选,力求将
LIBRANSHINAIMMIN
2011年9月
编者,向红轮

《汉英- 英汉藏学翻译词典》主要由正文(汉英英汉两部
分)和附录两大部分组成。::
一、正文部分(汉英部分)共分三个部分:1)汉文;2)英译;
3)注释。汉文部分按首字的音序排列(详见书后的汉语拼音检
索表)。英译部分保留多种英文译法,便于译者参考和对照。为
了查阅和排版方便,没有标出必要的冠词,动词则采用ing形式
以示区别。注释部分旨在使读者理解一些藏文词汇的历史背景和
晦涩难懂的内涵。同一词目具有两个以上的译文用“或”隔开。
书名或条约名称依惯例均用书名号《 》表示,正文部分保留
了一些约定俗成的藏文音译,如“哈达”、“龙达”、“擦擦”等。
二、正文部分(英汉部分)按英文字母顺序排列。为了检
索方便,其顺序排列不分英文字母的大小写。藏文转写的词目以
前加字的顺序排列。为了便于查索,词目只有简单的注释并注明
出处。如有需要,读者可参阅汉英相应部分的注释。
三、附录包括:1)西藏大事年表;2)吐蕃赞普世系表;
3)历代达赖喇嘛世系表;4)历代班禅喇嘛世系表;5) 西藏常
见旧官衔、官职、小吏及僧职、学位译写对照表;6)与西藏历
史有关的人物(第一部分:藏族、蒙古族和汉族人物;第二部
分:外国人物和外国藏学家);7)封号与印文;8)神、佛、
魔、菩萨一览表;9) 西藏寺院一览表;10)常见藏族人名一览
表;11) 常见西藏地名一览表;12)藏学书目(附重要典籍解
释);13)梵汉词汇表;14)汉藏词汇表:15)汉藏书目目录;
2016-05-5856KPa



16)藏文一拉丁文转写方案;17) 汉语拼音检索表。
四、西藏大事年表记录了史前时期至公元2006 年间的重大
历史事件。1949年前的大事记(中文稿)以《宝藏——中国西
藏历史文物》的年表为依据。1949年后的大事记(中文稿)是
由《中国西藏》杂志社提供的。
五、吐蕃赞普世系表、历代达赖喇嘛世系表、历代班禅喇嘛
世系表和西藏常见旧官衔、官职、小史及僧职、学位译写对照表
按首字音序排列,参考《汉英·英汉藏学词汇》的附录并做了
必要的修订。
六、与西藏历史有关的人物按首字音序排列。第一部分包括
藏族及少数蒙古族和汉族人物。其中藏族人物包括西藏历史上的
重要人物及现代人物的出生年代及身份。第二部分的外国人物和
外国藏学家,包括进入西藏的外国旅行家、探险家及著名藏学家
的出生年代及其藏学研究方面的代表作。
七、封号与印文按首字音序排列,包括明、清两朝对西藏僧
侣、宗教领袖册封的名号及颁赐的印信。
八、神、佛、魔、菩萨一览表按首字音序及英文字母两种方
式分别排列。为节省篇幅,一览表中只有神、佛、魔、菩萨名的
英文译法。一些重要神、佛、魔、菩萨的译文后都注有(见正
文注释】的字样,以便想详细了解它们的读者在正文注释中查
阅。
九、西藏寺院一览表按首字音序排列。包括寺院的英文译
文、藏文转写及寺院所在地。许多寺院对应的汉译名称繁杂,为
了检索方便,均保留一寺多名的不同排列。
十、常见藏族人名一览表和常见西藏地名一览表均按首字音
序排列并附有拼音和藏文转写,并保留汉译的多种方式(如
lus..
.
.
。
。。
。。。。,一
口
的 一用即时百四时同时同时
,通。
。
。
十一、藏书目按首字音序排列,包括近800 部国内外出版
的藏学典籍和书籍。
十二、梵汉词汇表和汉藏词汇表按首字音序排列,收录了本
词典中出现的梵文藏文词汇,供读者参考。

亦称“菩提道场”或“菩提伽耶”。 宝库。是我国近代编校刻印佛经的
佛教圣地。在古印度摩揭陀国(今印 著名佛教文化机构,先后补刻及新刻
度比哈尔邦南部)尼连禅河西岸。相,经版二百余卷,出版了《玄奘法师译
传释迦牟尼在此菩提树下结跏跌坐,撰全集》。藏经版也从四万余片增加
悟十二因和四谛。现存一座高五十 到十五万片,包括典籍一千五百七十
二米的大塔。

5 十石
亦称“十一面观音”。观音菩萨形亦称“十字标识”。一种十字形状

藏文/Tibetan script .. …
介绍藏族起源的一幅绘画作品。 | 藏族统一使用的一种书写文字。
据说藏族的起源是由观音所化現的 吐蕃大臣吞米·桑布扎仿照梵文的
猕猴与罗刹女结合面流传下来。藏 一些文字体系结合藏语的实际于公
人认为正是观音菩萨的开化,藏民族 元七世纪创制。 ::
才得以教化,逐渐开创文明。

条约,共六款,另以《拉萨条约》作为与菩萨各尊,其间亦含有哲学意味。

(史前时期至公元2010 年)

-14 - k141

---------11-11-
11-01-12
by a Chronology of Important Events in Tibets
( Prehistoric Age - 2010 A. D. )
”
师。
有意理事
千层石器时代的中晚
主要使用石片制成的工具。
About 50,000 ~ 10,000 years ago, Tibet was in the mid-late period of
the Paleolithic Age. Tibetan ancestors mainly used tools made of
chipped stones.
距今约一万至三千年前,西藏处于新石器时代,河谷地区以农业为
主,兼有狩猎和养畜,主要工具为磨制的细石器。出现原始陶器。
About 10,000 -3,000 years ago, Tibet was in the period of the Neo-
lithic Age. Valley inhabitants took agriculture as well as hunting and
animal husbandry as their major productive measures. Polished micro-
lith served as major tools, and primitive pottery wares emerged.
距今约一千年前,进入以铜器为标志的“早期金属时期”。藏族社
67
mar" he frie”
。目
前
,
是目。」即可。
目」昭在目中。。。。。。

三
百五

西藏大事年表
九
m in
i
trinesis
i"
会经历了四十小国、十二小邦并存时期。出现雍仲苯教。
About 3,000 years ago, Tibet entered the period of the Early Metal
Age marked by copper wares. Forty small states and twelve small fed-
erated states coexisted in Tibetan society. g•Yung-drung Bon Religion
emerged.
""" writi or"ui Tript in I":""infini""""j"ft"1" || IT F | 17*"i"i"*"inify"in"
公元前二世纪,轰赤赞普兼并十二小邦中的努域陵古,被尊为“神
圣赞普提悉补野”,视为吐蕃第一代赞普。修建最早的雍布
拉康。
In the third century B. C., Nye-khri-btsan-po annexed gNubs-yul-gling-
dgu, one of the twelve small federated States. He was given an honor-
ific title of “vPhrul-gyi-Iha-btsan-povo-lde-spu-rgyal" ( divine bТsan-
po of Tubo royal tribes) and viewed as the first bТsan-po in Tubo pe-
riod. Yum-bu-lha-khang, the earliest fortress, was constructed.
公元六世纪末,赞普囊日伦赞征服临近各邦国,将势力范围扩张到
拉萨河流域。
At the end of the sixth century A. D., bТsan-po gNam-ri-blong-btsan
conquered the neighboring states and expanded the sphere of his influ-
ence to Lhasa River Valley:
公元624年,藏历“火空海”纪年开始。
In 624, Tibetan calendar, a way of numbering years ( Me-kha-rgya-
mtsho), began to be used in Tibet.
::
公元628年,松赞干布即位。 .... ..
In 628, Srong-btsan-sgam-po came to the throne..
.
..
!?
公元633年,松赞干布承袭其父囊日伦赞为赞普,完成统一大业,
建立统一的奴隶制政权吐蕃王朝,定都逻些(拉萨),修建布达拉
宫。派吞米桑布扎赴印度留学,数年后返回吐蕃完善藏文,确定
672



西藏大事年表
# t t *XI . FF tai *#4.
In 633, Srong-btsan-sgam-po succeeded his father gNam-ri-blong-
btsan's throne, completing the unification and establishing Tubo King-
dom, a unified political power of slavery. He chose Lhasa as the cap-
ital of his kingdom, supervised the construction of the Potala Palace
and sent Thon-mi-sam-bho-ta to India to study. Several years later,
Thon-mi-sam-bho-ta returned to Tubo and perfected the Tibetan
script, establishing two styles of writing, (U-chen and U-med) and
formulating theories on Tibetan grammar. In this period started the
translation on Buddhist scriptures.
ATT 635 #E, FAW F #TREET (EUR) EH.
In 635, Srong-btsan-sgam-po married Nepalese Princess Bhrikuti Devi
as his consort : :
: :
A70 640 E, #A# FFYRXE#kto
In 640, Srong-btsan-sgam-po dispatched his minister sGar-stong-rtsan
to Chang'an for a marriage. .
....
AL 641
EXI STA FT . EMA
F THEŽ e # 4 IN 1# tita
# # #
In 641, Princess Wen Cheng, Emperor Taizong's adopted daughter,
entered Tubo to marry Srong-btsan-sgam-po. Srong-btsan-sgam-po's
consort Mong-bzav-khri-lcam proposed the construction of Yer-pa
Monastery. Jo-khang Temple was completed under the supervision of
Princess Bhrikuti Devi while Princess Wen Cheng took charge of the
construction of Re-mo-che Temple...
ATT 649, FEP (,7WTA F# 94 GEBE.
In 649, Emperor Gaozong of the Tang Dynasty succeeded the throne

西藏大事年表
and conferred upon Srong-btsan-sgam-po the titles of “ Fuma"
(Emperor's son-in-law) and “Prince of the West Ocean". .
公元650年,松赞干布卒,唐遣官入藏吊祭。因子早發,由孙若松
艾赞为赞普::: ::: :::.... . ..... :::::
In 650, Srong-btsan-sgam-po passed away. The Tang Court dis-
patched envoys to enter Tubo for condolences. For Srong-btsan-sgam-
po's son had died already, Mang-srong-mang-btsan, his grandson,
succeeded to be a bТsan-po.

公元680 年,文成公主卒。
In 680, Princess Wen Cheng passed away.
..….... ... .... ::: ::::
公元八世纪,宇妥·云丹贡布写成藏族巨著《四部医典》,成为藏
医理论之作;建立译经院,首次编撰一套藏文典籍目录。
In the eighth century, g•Yu-thog Yon-tan-mgom-po finished writing a
huge medical work entitled Four Medical Classics, which has become
a theoretical work for Tibetan medicine. Translation institutions were
established. Three sets of catalogues on Tibetan classics were com-
piled for the first time.
公元704 年,赤德祖赞遣使赴长安寻求与唐朝联姻。
In 704, Khri-Ide-gtsug-btsan sent emissaries to Chang'an "to seek a
matrimonial bond with the Tang Court.....
i
公元710 年,唐中宗养女金城公主与赞普杰德祖赞联姻: :
In: 710, Princess Jin Cheng, Tang Emperor Zhongzong's adopted
daughter, married bТsan-po Khri-ide-gtsug-btsan.
公元755年,赤松德赞即位。
In 755, Khri-srong-Ide-btsan succeeded the throne.

公元761年,赤松德赞赞普派人往印度迎请高僧莲花生、寂护人蕃
传授佛法。
In 761, Khri-srong-lde-btsan sent some persons to India to invite emi-
nent monks Padmasambhava and Santarakṣita to Tubo to preach Bud-
dhist.doctrines... . . .:.,5321 .... : :

公元779年,桑耶寺落成,开始制度蕃弟子七人出家,佛教僧侣
制度自此建立。
In 779, bSam-yas Monastery was completed Seven persons from Tubo
royal families were tonsured. As a result, the Buddhist theocracy was

公元797年,牟尼赞普继赞普位。
In 797, Mu-ni-btsan-po succeeded bТsan-po's throne.

公元798年,赤松赞开始执政。
In 798, Khri-lde-srong-btsan began his rule. :

公元815 年,赤祖德赞即赞普位,年号“彝泰”

In 815, Khri-gtsug-Ide-btsan succeeded bТsan-po's throne, giving the

公元823年,赤祖德赞为纪念唐蕃长庆会盟,在大昭寺前立“唐蕃
会盟碑”,亦称“甥舅会盟碑”。
In 823, Tang-Tubo Peace Pledge Monument, also called the Uncle-
nephew Peace Pledge Stele, was erected in front of Jo-khang Temple
in the period of Khri-gtsug-Ide-btsan's reign in memory of the peace
pledge in Changqing between the Tang Court and Tubo Kingdom.

675



西藏大事年表
www.amminature......
In 841, gLang-dar-ma succeeded bТsan-po's throne and implemented
the policy of forbidding and persecuting Buddhism.: .
公元846年,朗达玛被拉隆贝吉多吉杀死,吐蕃王朝崩溃,藏传佛
教“前弘期”结束。 ... . .. .
In 846, gLang-dar-ma was murdered by Lha-lung-dpal-gyi-rdo-rje.
Tubo Kingdom collapsed and the Former Prosperity of Tibetan Bud-
dhism ended.
公元869年,奴隶及属民大起义,初掀起于多康地区,后遍及吐蕃
全境。
In 869, slaves and subjects held uprisings, which originated in mDo-
Khams regions, and then extended in the whole territory of Tubo King-
dom.
公元895 年,朗达玛的曾孙吉德尼玛衮逃往阿里地区,其后裔建立
古格王朝,另一支后裔在山南地区建立拉嘉里政权。原先被吐蕃
兼并的十二个小邦的后裔也纷纷直立政权,进入长达三百余年的
分治时期。
In 895, Kyi-de-nyi-ma-mgon, grand grandson of gLang-dar-ma, ſled
to mNgav-ris, and his descendents established Gu-ge Kingdom. An-
other branch set up Lha-rgya-ri Regime in Lho-kha. Twelve small fed-
erated states annexed earlier by Tubo Kingdom gradually established
their own political powers. The Disintegration Period lasted for more
than 300 years.
公元975年,古格王益西沃派遣仁钦桑布赴印度学习梵文和佛教,
历时十年,成为分治时期的第一个译师。.... . . .
In 975, Ye-shes-vod, King of Gu-ge Kingdom, sent Rin-chen-bzang-
po to India to study Sanskrit and Buddhism. He stayed there for 10
years and then became the first translator in the Disintegration Period.
676



西藏大事年表

公元978年,
桑耶寺寺主益西坚赞资助鲁梅·楚臣喜饶等“藏
十人”赴多康学习佛法,取经后返回传发授徒,使佛教在西藏地区
再度传播,称为藏传佛教“后弘期”之始。 .. . . . .
In 978, Ye-shes-rgyal-mtshan, abbot of bSam-yas Monastery, aided
financially "ten persons from dBus-gTsang” including kLu-mes Tshul-
khrims-shis-rab to Khams to study Buddhist doctrines. They preached
Buddhist doctrines and taught disciples after they finished their stud-
ies. As a result, Buddhism was once again spread in Tibet, which is
viewed as the beginning of the Later Prosperity of Tibetan Buddhism.
公元十一世纪,藏族长篇史诗《格萨尔王传》开始广为流传。
In the eleventh century, King Gesar, a Tibetan heroic epic, began to
be widely spread.
公元1026年,藏历“火空海”纪年终止。次年,现行藏历第一饶迥
(甲子)开始,每六十年一轮,称为饶。
In 1026, the way of numbering years ( Me-kha-rgya-mtsho) in Tibet
ended. In the following year began the first Rab-byung (one sixty-
years eycle), the way of numbering years used in present-day Tibetan
calendar.

公元1030年,古格王益西沃修建托林寺寺供仁欽桑布长住译经授
徒。因译经有功,封赐谿卡(庄园)。
In 1030, under the supervision of Ye-shes-vod, King of Gu-ge King-
dom, mTho-Iding Monastery was built as a residence for Rin-chen-
bzang-po, who expounded Buddhist doctrines and taught disciples
there for a long period. He was bestowed upon a gZhis-ka (manor)
for his meritorious service in translating Buddhist scriptures. I
.A.12.4.1.12.

公元1056年,仲敦巴率弟子建热振寺,该寺为藏传佛教噶当派第
一寺院。
In 1056, Rwa-sgreng Monastery was completed under the supervision
of vBrom-ston-pa and his disciples. It served as the first monastery of
the bKav-gdams-pa Sect of Tibetan Buddhism.
公元1057年,噶当派创立。
In 1057, the bKav-gdams-pa Seet was founded..

公元1073年,昆·贡却杰布在作曲河谷修建萨迦寺,定为藏传佛
教萨迦派主寺。萨迦派创立。
In 1073, Sa-skya Monastery in Drung-chu Valley was completed un-
der the supervision of Kun Kong-chos-rje-po. It served as the major
monastery of the Sa-skya-pa Sect of Tūbetan Buddhism. The Sa-skya-
pa Sect was founded. 14 ..

公元158 年,多吉杰布在帕木竹巴地方创建丹萨替寺,并在此传
法十余年,成为帕竹噶举派的主寺,也是帕木竹巴兴起之始。
In 1158, gDan-sa-mthil Monastery was completed in Phag-mo-gru un-
der the supervision of rDo-rje-kyab-po, who then expounded Buddhist
doctrines there for over 10 years. It is the major monastery of the

mtshan not only compiled and wrote Sa-skya Mottoes, but also bettered
the system of the Five Kinds of Greater Knowledge and the Five Kinds
of Lesser Knowledge.

公元1215 年,噶玛噶举派都松钦巴圆寂后,其再传弟子噶玛拔希
为都松钦巴的转世,开创了活佛转世制度。这一制度后被其他教
派袭用和不断完善。
In 1215, after the death of Dus-gsum-mkhyen-pa of the Karma-bkav-
gryud-pa Sect, Karma-pag-shi, his repeated transferred disciple, be-
came his reincarnation. This was the origin of the reincarnation system
of Living Buddha, which was followed and continuously perfected by
other sects.
..
.

公元1244年,成吉思汗之孙阔端致函萨迦班智达贡噶堅赞,邀其
去凉州,商量归顺蒙古事宜。
In 1244, Go-dan, Genghis Khan's grandson, wrote a letter to invite
Sa-skya Pandita Kun-dgav-rgyal-mtshan to Liangzhou to discuss the
submission to the Mongols.

公元1247年,萨班·贡噶坚赞及其侄儿八思巴、恰纳多吉兄弟在
凉州拜见阔端,并发表了《萨班致蕃人书》,为西藏正式纳入中国
版图、统一祖国疆土作出了重大贡献。
In 1247, Sa-pan Kun-dgav-rgyal-mtshan, together with his nephews
vPhags-pa and Phag-na-rdo-rje, paid a formal visit to Go-dan in Lian-
gzhou and wrote Letter of Investiture to Zha-lu Monastery by Sa-skya
Kun-dgav-rgyal-mtshan. He made an important contribution to the of-
ficial incorporation of Tibet into the territory of the Yuan Dynasty and
the unification of the motherland.

In 1251, Mengge succeeded the Khan's throne. Kun-dgav-rgyal-
mtshan passed away. Phags-pa succeeded to be the head of the Sa-
skya-pa Sect.

公元1253年,忽必烈在军中召见八思巴和噶玛拔希,商谈西藏宗
教首领与蒙古王室的关系,并奉八思巴为“上师”。
In 1253, Kublai called in vPhags-pa and Karma-pag-shi to meet him
in his army camp and discussed with them the relations between Tibet-
an religious leaders and the Mongol royal families. Phags-pa was re-
spectfully conferred upon the title of “Master”.. . P ER
公元1259年,八思巴与忽必烈在京师相会。次年,忽必烈即汗位,
封八思巴为“国师”,
并派人入藏清查户籍,设立驿站。 3 .5
In 1259, Phags-pa met Kublai in the capital. In the following year,
Kublai succeeded Khan's throne and conferred the title of “State Tu-
tor" upon vPhags-pa. Officials were sent to Tibet to conduct census
and set up post stations.

1260 年,忽必烈汗即位,赐予八思巴“帝师”、“国师”和“大宝法

In 1260, Kublai Khan succeeded the throne and conferred upon

Treasure Prince of Dharma".

公元1264 年,
忽必烈迁都北京,设立总制院统领天下释教和吐蕃
境内行政事务,授令八思巴兼掌总制院院务。
In 1264, Kublai moved his capital to Beijing. The Yuan Court set up
the General Council to take charge of religious and administrative af-
fairs of Tibet. VPhags-pa was ordered to be concurrently in charge of
the affairs of the General Council.
公元1268年,忽必烈派员会同萨迦本钦释迦桑布调查卫藏户口,
并设划“十三万户”。
In 1268, Kublai sent officials to conduct census in dBus-gTsang Re-

gions together with Sa-skya dPon-chen Shakya-bzang-po. Thirteen

公元1269年,八思巴至大都(北京)呈献奉命创制的蒙古新字(八
思巴字),忽必烈立即下诏颁行,次年,八思巴为忽必烈灌顶,升为
“
帝师”,賜玉印。
In 1269, vPhags-pa went to Dadu (Beijing)., presenting the new
Mongolian quadratic script (vPhags-pa script) he had created by or-
der. Kublai immediately issued an edict to put it in use. In the follow-
ing year, vPhags-pa conducted baptism for Kublai, and he was con-
ferred upon the title of " Imperial Tutor" and bestowed upon a jade
seal.

公元1280 年,八思巴卒。
In 1280, vPhags-pa passed away.
公元1281年,元朝平息萨迦内争,封达玛巴拉为“帝师”。
In 1281, the Yuan Court put down the internal conflicts of the Sa-
skya-pa Sect and conferred the title of " Impérial Tutor” upon Dharma-
pala.
公元十四世纪前半叶,元朝主要倚重萨迦派,多次封其高僧为帝
师。布敦·仁钦珠编撰纳塘版《珠尔》。
In the first half of the fourteenth century, the Yuan Court mainly sup-
ported the Sa-skya-pa Sect and conferred several times the titles upon
eminent monks of this sect. Bu-ston Rin-chen-grub edited bstan-
gyur of sNa-thang edition.
公元1322年,《布敦佛教史》成书。
In 1322, Bu-ston's History of Buddhism came out..

建立地方政权。元朝顺帝任命绎曲坚赞为“大司徒”。

attack Sa-skya, seized its territory and established the local power in
$Nevu-dong. Yuan Emperor Shun appointed Byang-chub-rgyal-mtshani

公元1406 年,明成祖封帕木竹巴首领扎巴坚赞为“灌顶国师阐化
王”,世代承袭。同年,哈麻(噶玛巴·却贝桑波)应明成祖之邀
前往南京,次年为已故太祖帝后念经荐福,多有灵端,被封为“如
来大宝法王”賜玉印。
In 1406, Ming Emperor Chengzu conferred the title of " Promotion
Prince of Virtue, State Initiation Tutor" upon Grags-pa-rgyal-mtshan,
head of the Phag-mo-gru-pa Regime, and allowed this title to be suc-
ceeded for generations. In the same year, Karmapa Chos-dpal-bzang-
po visited Nanjing at the invitation of Ming Emperor Chengzu. In the
following year, he was conferred upon the title of “ Tathāgata Great
Precious Prince of Faith" and bestowed upon a jade seal because of
his efficacious results in reciting Buddhist scriptures to release souls of
the late Emperor Taizu and the empress. ! . . Bu

公元1414 年,萨迦也失抵达北京,次年被封为“国师”,赐诰命。
明成祖第二次邀请宗喀巴赴南京。
In 1414, Shakya-ye-shes arrived in Beijing. In the following year, he
was conferred upon the title of "State Tutor” and bestowed upon an e-
dict. Emperor Chengzu invited Tsong-kha-pa to Nanjing for the second
time.
公元1416 年,宗喀巴弟子绎央却杰主持修建哲蚌寺,成为格鲁派
最大寺院。明成祖任命诺尔布桑波之父南喀杰波为军事长官统领
后藏仁蚌地区。
In 1416, under the supervision of vJam-dbyangs-chos-rje, Tsong-kha-
pa's disciple, vBras-sprungs Monastery was completed, which became
the largest one of the dGe-lugs-pa Sect. Emperor Chengzu appointed
Nam-mkhav-rgyal-po, father of Nor-bu-bzang-po, military commander
in charge of Rin-spungs District in gTsang Region....... .
公元1419年,释迦也失在拉萨北郊主持修建色拉寺。
In 1419, under the supervision of Shakya-ye-shes, Se-ra Monastery
was completed in the northern suburb of Lhasa..
..
.
公元1419年,宗喀巴卒。
In 1419, Tsong-kha-pa passed away.
公元1432年,扎巴迴乃执政,英宗皇帝赐予他“阐化王”称号。
In 1432, Grags-pa-vbyung-gnas came to power, and Emperor Ying-
zong conferred upon him the title of “Prince of Expounding Bud-
dhism".
公元1434年,释迦也失再次进京觐见明宣宗,被封为“大慈法
686



西藏大事年表
王”。
In 1434, Shakya-ye-shes revisited Beijing to pay homage to Ming Em-
peror Xuanzong, and he was conferred upon the title of “Great Com-
passion. Prince of Dharina” .
...
. : :
公元1438年,一世班禅克珠杰圆寂。
In 1438, mKhas-grub-rje, the First Panchen Lama, passed away.
公元1445年,贡噶勒巴执政,英宗皇帝赐予他“潮化王”称号。
In 1445, Kun-dgav-legs-pa came to power, and Emperor Yingzong
conferred upon him the title of Prince of Expounding Buddhism". :
公元1447年,根敦主巴兴建扎什伦布寺,该寺是四世班禅以后历
代班禅的主寺。
In 1447, dGe-dun-grub-pa proposed the construction of bkra-shis-
Ihun-po Monastery, which served as the major monastery of Panchen
Lamas of successive generations after the Fourth Panchen.

In 1448, Rin-chen-rdo-rje came to power, and Emperor Yingkong
conferred upon him the title of “Prince of Expounding Buddhism”.

In 1454, Ngag-gi-dbang-po came to power, and Emperor Yingzong
conferred upon him the title of “Prince of Expounding Buddhism".

In 1474, dGe-vdun-grub-pa, the First Dalai Lama, passed away.
公元1475年,根敦嘉措成为二世达赖喇嘛。
In 1475, dGe-vdun-rgya-mtsho became the Second Dalai Lama.....

公元1488年,后藏高僧桑杰坚赞撰写《米拉日巴传》
传记文学
问世。 . ...
In 1488, Sangs-rgyas-rgyal-mtshan, an eminent monk from gTsang,
wrote Biography of Mi-las-ri-pa.
公元1499年,阿吉旺波之子阿旺·扎西扎巴在成年时掌权。
In 1499, Ngag-dbang bKra-shis-grags-pa, son of Ngag-gi-dbang-po,
assumed power when he came of age. . . ::..::
公元1512 年,武宗皇帝赐予阿旺·扎西扎巴“阐化王”称号。
In 1512, Emperor Wuzong conferred the title of “Prince of Expoun-
ding Buddhism” upon Ngag-dbang bKra-shis-grags-pa.
公元1517 年,根敦嘉措任哲蚌寺住持,次年主持拉萨正月祈愿
法会。”
In 1517, dGe-dun-rgya-mtsho acted as the abbot of vBras-spungs
Monastery. In the following year, he presided over the Grand Prayer
Ceremony (sMon-lam-chen-mo) held in the first lunar month by Ti-
betan calendar. 3
公元1542年,二世达赖喇嘛圆寂。
In 1542, the Second Dalai Lama passed away.
公元1543年,索南嘉措成为第三世达赖喇嘛。
In 1543, bSod-nams-rgya-mtsho became the Third Dalai Lama.
公元1546年,索南嘉措被认定为根敦嘉措的转世而迎入哲蚌寺,
此为格鲁派采用活佛转世制度之始。
In 1546, bSod-nams-rgya-mtsho was confirmed as the reincarnation of
dGe-vdun-rgya-mtsho and greeted into vBras-spungs Monastery, which
688



酒藏大事年表
was the origin of the reincarnation system of Living Buddha adopted by
the dGe-lugs-pa Sect.
公元1564年,巴俄·祖拉陈瓦撰写的《贤者喜宴》成书。
In 1564, A Feast for Wise Men written by dPav-bo gTsug-lag-phreng-
ba cane out. ..: :.

In 1565, Emperor Shizong conferred upon Zhing-gshags-pa Tshe-
brtan-rdo-rje the title of “State Initiation Tutor" and "King of Dhar-
ma".

之始。
In 1578, Altan Khan conferred an honorific title of “ Dalai Lama" up-
on bSod-nams-rgya-mtsho, which was the origin of this title. !!!

公元1589年,丹嘉措成为四世达赖喇嘛。
In 1589, Yon-tan-rgya-mtsho became the Fourth Dalai Lama.
公元1611年,云丹嘉措获得神宗皇帝赐予的“普持金刚佛”称号。
云丹嘉措因病圆寂。
In 1611, Yon-tan-rgya-mtsho received the title of 5. Master of Va-
jradhara" from Emperor Shenzong. Yon-fan-rgya-mtsho died of ill-
ness.

公元1618年,后藏地区的第司彭措南杰推翻帕木竹巴的统治,控
制前后藏大部分地区,建立第司藏巴地方政权,自称“藏堆杰波”
(藏巴汗)。
In 1618, after overthrowing the Phag-mo-gru-pa Regime and control-
ling most part of dBus-gTsang Regions, Phun-tshogs-rnam-rgyal, sDe-
srid in gTsang, established the sDe-srid gTsang-pa Local Regime and
called himself gTsang-stod-rgyal-po (gTsang-pa Khan).

公元1642年,蒙古和硕特部首领固始汗率兵进藏,推翻第司藏巴
政权,建立甘丹颇章政权,同年,五世达赖遣使至盛京与清王室
通好。
In 1642 Gushi Khan, chief of the Mongol Hoshut Tribe, entered Ti-
bet with his troops, overthrowing the sDe-srid gTsang-pa Local Regime
and establishing the bKav-ldan-pho-brang Regime. In the same year,
the Fifth Dalai Lama sent envoys to Shengjing (present-day Sheny-
ang) to establish friendly relations with the Qing royal families.

公元1643年,创建药王山藏医学院。
In 1643, Tibetan Medicine. School was established at Medicine King
Hill (1Cags-po-ri).

公元1645年,固始汗赠四世班禅罗桑确吉坚赞“班禅博克多”尊
号。同年,五世达赖决定扩建布达拉宫,三年后白宫部分建成。
In 1645, Gushi Khan conferred the honorific title of “Panchen Pokto"
upon Blo-bzang-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan, the Fourth Panchen Lama. In
the same year, the Fifth Dalai Lama made a decision to expand the
Potala Palace. Three years later, the White Palace, part of the Potala
Palace,Was completed. :

公元1652年,五世达赖应顺治皇帝之邀于年底至京,次年被册封
为“西天大善自在佛所领天下释教普通瓦赤喇喇达赖”,赐金
册,金印。此后历代达赖喇嘛转世继位,须经中央政府册封,遂成
定制。
In 1652, invited by Emperor Shunzhi, the Fifth Dalai Lama arrived in
Beijing. In the following year, the Fifth Dalai Lama was conferred up-
on the title of " Dalai Lama, Buddha of Great Compassion in the
West, Leader of the Buddhist Faith beneath the Sky, Holder of the

Vajra" and bestowed upon a gold album and a gold seal. Since then,
it has become a convention that the reincarnations of Dalai Lamas of
successive generations should be granted by the Central Governments.
公元1662年,四世班禅罗桑确吉坚赞圆寂。
In 1662, the Fourth Panchen Lho-bzang-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan passed
away.
公元1663年,罗桑益西成为第五世班禅喇嘛。
In 1663, A. D. Blo-bzang-ye-shes became the Fifth Panchen Lama.
公元1676年,修建宁玛派主寺敏珠林寺。
In 1676, sMin-grol-gling Monastery, the major one of the rNing-ma-
pa Sect, was completed.
公元1682年,五世达赖圆寂。第巴·桑结嘉措秘不发丧,自己以
五世达赖名义处理政教事务。
In 1682, the Fifth Dalai Lama passed away. sDe-pa Sangs-rgyas-rgya-
mtsho kept his death a secret and he himself handled political and re-
ligious affairs in the name of the Fifth Dalai Lama.
公元1685 年,第巴·桑结嘉措历算论著《白琉璃》问世。
In 1685, a book on calculation ( White Glaze) written by sDe-pa
Sangs-rgyas-rgya-mtsho came out.
公元1688年,由第巴·桑结嘉措主持绘制《四部医典》唐卡八十
幅,并著《蓝琉璃》注疏《四部医典》。
In 1688, eighty Thangkas on Four Medical Classics were painted un-
der the supervision of sDe-pa Sangs-rgyas-rgyal-mtsho, who also wrote
Blue Glaze as an annotation for Four Medical Classics.. .

公元1690 年,由第巴·桑结嘉措主持修建的布达拉宫红宮部分
建成。
In 1690, the Red Palace, part of the Potala Palace, was completed
under the supervision of sDe-pa Sangs-rgyas-rgya-mtsho..
公元1694 年,五世达赖的灵塔在布达拉宫建成,次年开光。
In 1694, the Fifth Dalai Lama's reliquary Stupa was completed in the

公元16972年,仓央嘉措成为六世达赖喇嘛。
In 1697, Tshangs-dbyangs-rgya-mtsho became the Sixth Dalai Lama.

公元1705 年,拉藏汗诛杀第巴·桑结嘉措,废六世达赖仓央嘉
措,另立益西嘉措。
::
In 1705, Lha-bzang-khan murdered sDe-pa Sangs-rgyas-rgya-mtsho,
dethroned the Sixth Dalai Lama Tshangs-dbyangs-rgya-mtsho and en-
throned Ye-shes-rgya-mtsho.
:::
:
::::: : : :::::,
公元1709 年,清政府派侍郎赫寿进藏协助拉藏汗管理西藏事务。
In 1709, the Qing Government sent an official named He Shou to en-
ter Tibet to help Lha-bzang-khan handle affairs in Tibet. :::::
公元1713年,清朝正式册封五世班禅罗桑益西“班禅额尔德尼”
封号,赐金册、金印。自此,历代班禅额尔德尼转世继位须经中央
政府册封批准,亦成定制。
In 1713, the Qing Government officially conferred upon the Fifth Pan-
chen Lho-bzang-ye-shes the title of "Panchen Erdeni" and bestowed
upon him a gold album and a gold seal. Since then, it has become a
convention that the reincarnations of Panchen Lamas of successive
generations should be granted by the Central Governments."
693



西藏大事年表
公元1717年,蒙古准噶尔部侵扰西藏,杀拉藏汗,废益西嘉措,并
毁寺杀僧,引起康济霸、颇罗潮等起兵反抗。
In 1717, the Dzungars invaded Tibet. They killed Lha-bzang-khan
and dethroned Ye-shes-rgya-mtsho. They destroyed monasteries and
massacred monks, which resulted in military resistance led by Khang-
chen-nas and Pho-lho-nas. :
公元1718年,清军入藏讨伐准噶尔部未果,次年再派兵入藏驱逐
准噶尔部。
In 1718, the Qing troops entered Tibet to suppress the Dzungars, but
failed. In the following year, the Qing Court sent troops once again to
Tibet to drive out the Dzungars.
公元1720年,康熙皇帝派十四子册封格桑嘉措七世达赖喇嘛,
并进军西藏,护送格桑嘉措到拉萨布达拉宫坐床。
In 1720, Qing Emperor Kangxi sent his fourteenth son to confirm
bs Kal-bzang-rgya-mtsho as the Seventh Dalai Lama. His troops escorted
bsKal-bzang-rgya-mtsho to Tibet so as to be enthroned in the Potala
公元1721年,清朝在西藏废除第巴制,设噶伦四人共同管理政务。
In 1721, the Qing Court abolished the system of sDe-pa and estab-
lished another systern in which four DKav-blons (minister): handled
political affairs jointly. ....
...
公元1727年,清朝始设驻藏大臣办事衙门。 iii:
In 1727, the Qing Government began to set up an Amban Office in Ti-
公元1728,清政府任命颇罗彌总理藏事。
In 1728, the Qing Government authorized Pho-lho-nas to take charge
694



·西藏大事年表
of affairs in Tibet,
i
....
...::
:
:::
公元1750年,拉萨发生了反清之乱,驻藏大臣被杀。次年,乾隆皇
帝令废除郡王制,建立地方政府噶厦,由噶厦的四名噶伦办理行政
事务,统归达赖、驻藏大臣治下。. ..
.
In 1750, an armed rebellion against the Qing Court broke out in Lha-
sa, and the Amban was killed. In the following year, Emperor Qian.
long issued an order to abolish the System of Prince and establish the
local government of Tibet (bKav-shag), in which, led by Dalai Lama
and the Amban, four bkav-blons were in charge of administrative aft
fairs.
公元1754年,创建布达拉宫僧官学校。
In 1754, Potala Monk Official School was set up
. !!

公元1755年,七世达赖喇嘛于拉萨西郊建罗布林卡。
In 1755, Nor-bu-gling-kha (Jewel Park) was completed in the west-
ern suburb of Lhasa under the supervision of the Seventh Dalai Lama.
公元1757年,七世达赖圆寂。清朝中央政府令第穆呼图克图
摄政。 :
: : :::
: :
In 1757, the Seventh Dalai Lama passed away, and the Qing Court
ordered De-mo Hutuktu to be a regent....

公元1779年,六世班禅启程祝贺乾隆皇帝七十寿辰。
In 1779, the Sixth Panchen set off to convey congratulations to Emper-
or Qianlong for his seventieth birthday.

公元1780 年,六世班禅到承德为乾隆皇帝祝寿,又进北京朝贡和
讲经授戒,
年底圆寂于北京。

congratulations to Emperor Qianlong, and then went to Beijing to pay
tributes and preach Buddhist doctrines. At the end of this year, he

公元1782年,罗桑贝丹益西成为七世班禅喇嘛。
In 1782, Blo-bzang-dpal-Idan-ye-shes became the Seventh Panchen
Lama.
公元1784年,强白嘉措成为八世达赖喇嘛。
: :
In 1784, vJam-dpal-rgya-mtsho became the Eighth Dalai Lama.: ..
公元1791年,廓尔喀军队入后藏,抢掠扎什伦布寺,七世班禅避往
拉萨。其后,清军增兵反击廓尔喀军队取得胜利。
In 1791, the Gurkha troops invaded gTsang and plundered bKra-shis-
Thun-po Monastery. The Seventh Panchen fled to Lhasa. And then,
the Qing Court threw in enforcements to counterattack the Gurkhas and
defeated them..... .. .. ... . ....... ::
公元1793年,《钦定藏内善后章程》正式颁布,确定了以金瓶掣签
认定达赖班禅转世灵童的历史定制。
In 1793, Twenty-nine-Article Ordinance for the More Efficient Gover-
ning of Tibet was officially issued. A historical convention was estab-
lished that the reincarnated soul boys of Dalai Lamas and Panchen La-
mas should be confirmed through the method of drawing lots from a
gold urn. . .
.
公元1804 年,八世达赖喇嘛圆寂,命济隆呼图克图摄政。
In 1804, the Eighth Dalai Lama passed away. rJe-drung Hutuktu was
ordered to be a regent.
公元1807 年,隆朵嘉措成为九世达赖喇嘛。

In 1815, the Ninth Dalai Lama Lung-rtogs-rgya-mtsho passed away.
公元1816 年,楚臣嘉措成为十世达赖喇嘛。
In 1816, Tshul-khrims-rgya-mtsho became the Tenth Dalai Lama.

In 1837, the Tenth Dalai Lama Tshul-khrims-rgya-mtsho passed a-

公元1844年,清政府任命七世班禅喇嘛执掌西藏地方政府。
In 1844, the Qing Court authorized the Seventh Panchen Lama to take
charge of the local government of Tibet.

公元1855 年,咸丰皇帝任命十一世达赖喇嘛执掌西藏地方政府。
十一世达赖喇嘛克主嘉措圆寂。
In 1855, Emperor Xianfeng authorized the Eleventh Dalai Lama to
take charge of the local government of Tibet. The Eleventh Dalai La-
ma mKhas-grub-rgya-mtsho passed away.
公元1856年,西藏地方政府与尼泊尔政府签订议和条件十款,这
是涉藏的第一个不平等条约。
In 1856, Ten-article Treaty was issued between the local government
of Tibet and the Nepalese Government, which is the first unequal trea-
ty relating to Tibet.

In 1857, bsTan-pavi-dbang-phyug became the Eighth Panchen Lama.

公元1858年,成烈嘉措成为十二世达赖喇嘛。
In 1858, vPhrin-las-rgya-mtsho became the Twelfth Dalai Lama.

公元1875年,清政府任命十二世达赖喇嘛掌管西藏地方政府事
宜。十二世达赖喇成烈嘉措圆寂。
In 1875, the Qing Court authorized the Twelfth Dalai Lama to take
charge of the local government of Tibet. The Twelfth Dalai Lama vPhrin-
las-rgya-mtsho passed away.

In 1879, Thub-bstan-rgya-mtsho became the Thirteenth Dalai Lama.

公元1882年,八世班禅喇嘛圆寂。
In 1882, the Eighth Panchen Lama passed away. :

公元1888年,英军对隆吐山发动武装进攻,藏族军民奋起抵抗。
英军入侵帕里地区。
In 1888, the British army launched an armed attack to Mount Lungdo,
( Lung-thur-la) Tibetan army and people rose in resistance. The
British troops invaded Phag-ri Region.

公元1890年,清政府与英国签订了第一个涉藏的不平等条约,即:
《中英会议藏印条约》。
In 1890, the Qing Court concluded with Britain The Anglo-Chinese
Convention Relating to Sikkim and Tibet, the first unequal treaty rela-
ting to Tibet. ...

公元1895 年,清政府任命十三世达赖喇嘛执掌西藏地方政府。
In 1895, the Qing Government authorized the Thirteenth Dalai Lama
to take charge of the local government of Tibet...
)
.....
.
公元1903年,英国发动了大规模的侵藏战争。
In 1903, the British launched a large-scale war against Tibet.
公元1904年,
英国军队侵略西藏,西藏军民在江孜英勇抵抗,失
败。十三世达赖喇嘛逃离拉萨去外蒙古库伦。英军进入拉萨,强
迫订立《拉萨条约》,共十条。 .. .:;: :41 )
In 1904, the British troops invaded Tibet. Tibetan army and people
bravely resisted the British troops in Gyantse, but failed. The Thir-
teenth Dalai Lama fled from Lhasa to Urga, Outer Mongolia. The
British troops entered Lhasa. The Treaty of Lhasa (ten articles) was
signed under the pressure. Sit...
T u
公元1906 年十三世达赖喇嘛从外蒙古回藏,行至青海塔尔寺奉
旨停止,等候进京。清政府与英国签订了《中英续订藏印条约》并
以《拉萨条约》作为附约。
In 1906, the Thirteenth Dalai Lama returned to Tibet from Outer Mon-
golia. By order, he stayed at sKu-vbum Monastery in Qinghai, awai-
ting to enter Beijing. The Qing Government concluded with Britain
The Convention between Great Britain and China, and made The Lhasa
699



護藏大事年表
ܗܫܫܙܝܫܚܫܩܗܫܢܗ
Treaty an annex.
公元1907年,清政府派张荫棠进藏“查办藏事”,推行多项新政改
良措施。
In 1907, the Qing Government dispatched Zhang Yintang to enter Ti-
bet to investigate the administrations of Tibet” and implement some
new reform measures... :
公元1908年,十三世达赖喇嘛进京朝见光绪皇帝和慈禧太后,于
第二年返回拉萨。
In 1908, the Thirteenth Dalai Lama arrived in Beijing to pay homage
to Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. In the following
year, he returned to Lhasa. ..
公元1910年,清朝派川军抵拉萨。十三世达赖喇嘛为自身安全
逃往印度。
In 1910, the Qing Court dispatched Sichuan troops into Lhasa. The
Thirteenth Dalai Lama fled to India for his safety,
公元1911年,武昌起义。清朝灭亡。英国加紧对中印边界东段地
区的侵略。 .
.. . ..
In 1911, the Wuchang Uprising resulted in the collapse of the Qing
Dynasty. The British troops continuously invaded the eastern regions
along the Sino-Indian boundary.
公元1912 年,中华民国政府在北京成立,设立蒙藏事务处(后改名
蒙藏事务局),加强对蒙藏地区管理。十三世达赖喇嘛从印度回
藏。西藏地方政府制造“驱汉事件”,驻藏大臣系统至此瓦解
In 1912, the Government of the Republic of China was set up in Bei-
jing. The Office for Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs (Later on, the
Commission for Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs ) was set up so as to
700



西藏大事年表
strengthen the administration over Mongol and Tibetan regions. The
Thirteenth Dalai Lama returned to Tibet from India. The local govern-
ment of Tibet started the incident of "Hans, go home!” The system of
Amban came to an end..
.…..: 1.1.
1
公元1913 年,西姆拉会议召开。.
In 1913, Simla Convention was held.
公元1921年,拉萨喇嘛发动暴动,试图杀害驻藏英国官员。
In 1921, monks in Lhasa rioted, attempting to kill resident British of-
ficials.
公元1923年,第九世班禅曲吉尼玛从日喀则出走,次年抵甘肃。
再到北京、东北、内蒙古等地传法。
In 1923, the Ninth Panchen Chos-kyi-nyi-ma left Shigatze and arrived
in Gansu in the following year. After that, he preached Buddhist doc-
trines in Beijing, Northeast, Inner Mongolia and other places... ::
公元1928年,国民党在南京成立国民政府。十三世达赖喇嘛派代
表赴南京与国民政府联系。次年,国民政府在南京设立蒙藏委员
会。九世班禅在南京设办事处。
In 1928, the National Government was established in Nanjing. The
Thirteenth Dalai Lama sent representatives to Nanjing to make contacts
with it. In the following year, the National Government established the
Commission for Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs in Nanjing, and the
Ninth Panchen's Office was set up in Nanjing. :
: :
公元1931年,十三世达赖、九世班禅支持中央抗日主张。达赖在
南京设办事处。国民政府封九世班禅为“护国宣化广慧大师”。
次年,九世班禅赴南京任西画宣化使。
In 1931, the Thirteenth Dalai Lama and the Ninth Panchen Lama sup-

of “Great Master of Infinite Wisdom, Defender of the Nation and
Propagator of the Doctrine”. In the following year, the Ninth Panchen
went to Nanjing to act as the Western Borderland Publicity Commis-

In 1934, Rwa-sgreng Hutuktu Thub-bstan-vjam-dpal-ye-shes acted as
a regent. The National Government sent Huang Musong to attend the
mourning ceremony of the Thirteenth Dalai Lama, posthumously con-
ferring upon the Thirteenth Dalai Lama the title of “Great Master of
Patriotism, Magnanimity, Benevolence and Sagacity". It also decided
to establish the office of the Commission for Mongolian and Tibefan Af-
fairs in Lhasa. The Ninth Panchen was appointed as a member of the
National Government, and he was ready to return to Tibet....

西藏大事年表
公元1939年,在青海寻访的十三世达赖喇嘛转世灵童抵达拉萨。
In 1939, the reincarnated soul boy of the Thirteenth Dalai Lama who
had been found in Qinghai arrived at Lhasa. ;
公元1940年,十四世达赖喇嘛在布达拉宫坐床,国民政府派蒙藏
委员会委员长吴忠信入藏主持。次年热振活佛辞职,达扎活佛继
任摄政。
::
::::: :
In 1940, the Fourteenth Dalai Lama was enthroned in the Potala Pal-
ace. The National Government sent Wu Zhongxin, chairman of the
Commission for Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs, to enter Tibet to pre-
side over the enthronement ceremony. In the following year, Rwa-
sgreng Hutuktu requested to resign and sTag-brag succeeded this post.

公元1941年,确吉坚赞成为一世班禅喇嘛。
In 1941, Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan became the Tenth Panchen Lama..

公元1947年,达扎的老师热振呼图克图及十四世达赖喇嘛之父确
次仁被以达扎为首的亲英分子谋害。

Chos-skyong-tshe-ring (the Fourteenth Dalai Lama's father) were

公元1949年,十世班禅额尔德尼确吉坚赞在青海塔尔寺坐床。中
华人民共和国成立。
In 1949, the Tenth Panchen Erdini Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan was en-
throned in sKum-vbúum Monastery, Qinghai. The People's Republic of
China was established.

”



西藏大事年表
In 1950, the Central People's Government sent an order for the libera-
tion of Tibet. Chab-mdo Battle broke out.
公元1951年5月23日,中央人民政府与西藏地方政府签订了《中
央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议》。10
月26日中国人民解放军抵达拉萨。十世班禅从青海启程进藏。
On May 23 of 1951, The Agreement of the Central People's Government
and the Local Government of Tibet on Measures for the Peaceful Libera-
tion of Tibet was signed. The Chinese People's Liberation Army ar-
rived at Lhasa on October 26. The Tenth Panchen left Qinghai for Ti-
bet.
公元1952年,十世班禅到达拉萨,在布达拉宫会见十四世达赖喇
嘛。毛泽东在北京接见西藏致敬团。
In 1952, the Tenth Panchen Lama arrived at Lhasa. He had an inter-
view with the Fourteenth Dalai Lama in the Potala Palace. Chairman
Mao Zedong received the Tibet Delegation in Beijing.
公元1954年,十四世达赖喇嘛和第十世班禅分别启程前往北京,
出席全国第一次全国人民代表大会,达赖喇嘛当选全国人大常委
会副委员长,班禅当选人大常委会委员。在全国政协二届一次会
议上,班禅当选全国政协副主席。青藏、川藏公路正式通车到
拉萨。
In 1954, the Fourteenth Dalai Lama and the Tenth Panchen Lama left
for Beijing to attend the First National People's Congress. The Four-
teenth Dalai Lama was elected as vice-chairman of the Standing Com-
mittee of the National People's Congress and the Tenth Panchen Lama
as a member of the Standing Committee of the National People's Con-
gress. In the First Session of the Second Chinese People's Political
Consultative Conference, the Tenth Panchen Lama was elected as
vice-chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Confer-
704



西藏大事年表
ence. Qinghai-Tibet and Sichuan-Tibet Roads to Lhasa were officially
open to traffic.
公元1956年,西藏自治区筹备委员会成立大会在拉萨举行,由达
赖喇嘛任主任委员,班禅喇嘛为副主任委员。陈毅副总理率领的
中央代表团到拉萨。
In 1956, the meeting for the founding of the Preparatory Committee for
the Establishment of the Tibet Autonomous Region was held in Lhasa.
The Fourteenth Dalai Lama acted as its chairman and the Tenth Pan-
chen Lama as vice-chairman. Marshal Chen Yi led the Central Dele-
公元1959年3月,西藏地方政府和上层反动集团在拉萨制造武装
叛乱。十四世达赖逃离拉萨。人民解放军奉命平息叛乱,国务院
发布命令,解散西藏地方政府,由西藏自治区筹委会行使西藏地方
政府职权,班禅代理筹委会主任委员,帕巴拉·格列朗杰为副主任
委员,阿沛,阿旺普美为副主任委员兼秘书长。西藏进行民主改
革,宣布废除封建农奴主土地所有制。
In March of 1959, the local government of Tibet and the upper-class
reactionary forces started the rebellion in Lhasa. The Fourteenth Dalai
Lama escaped from Lhasa. By order, the People's Liberation Army
put down the armed rebellion. The State Council issued an order to
disband the local government of Tibet , and entrust the Preparatory
Committee for the Establishment of the Tibet Autonomous Region to
exercise the functions and powers of the local government of Tibet. The
Tenth Panchen Lama temporarily acted as its chairman and vPhags-
pa-lha dGe-leg-rnam-rgyal acted as its vice-chairman. Nga-phad
Ngag-dbang-vjigs-med acted as its vice-chairman and concurrently
secretary-general. The Democratic Reform started in Tibet, which
marked the abolishment of the system of serf-owner's ownership of
land.. .

酒藏大事年表
公元1960年,拉萨召开第一届人民代表大会,成立拉萨市人民政
府。拉萨纳金水电站建成交付使用。中国登山队首次从北坡登上
世界最高峰珠穆朗玛峰。
: :::
:
In 1960, the First People's Congress was held in Lhasa, and the Lha-
sa Municipal People's Government was set up in Lhasa. Nga-chen
Hydroelectric Power Station in Lhasa was completed and put in use:
For the first time, the Chinese Mountaineering Team reached Jo-mo-
glang-ma, the highest peak in the world, from the northern slope. ?

公元1961年,中国边防部队胜利地进行了中印边界反击战,并主
动采取措施积极谋求中印边界问题的和平解决。
In 1961, the Chinese frontier guards successfully launched a war of
self-defense along the Sino-India boundary and took active measures to
solve this issue in a peaceful way...

公元1965年9月,西藏自治区正式成立,中央派由副总理谢富治
为团长的代表团前来祝贺。 : :
: :::,
In September of 1965, the Tibet Autonomous Region was officially set
up. The Central Government dispatched Xie Fuzhi, vice-premier and
head of the Delegation, to go to Tibet to convey congratulations. , ...!

公元1966年,西藏也开始搞“
文化大革命”。曲水大桥建成通车。
贡嘎机场建成通航。
In 1966, the Cultural Revolution broke out in Tibet Chu-shur Bridge
was completed and open to traffic. Gong-dgar Airport was completed
and put in use... .. . .. . .

公元1968年,中国科学院西藏科学考察队对珠穆朗玛峰地区进行
大规模考察。 2013: .. .
….. .:
In 1968, the Tibetan Scientific Investigation Team from the Chinese
706
方 一片了



西藏大事年表
Academy of Sciences conducted a large-scale investigation on Jo-mo-
glang-ma regions.

公元1970年,西藏办起了六百多个人民公社。
In 1970, more than six hundred People's Communes were set up in Ti-
bet.: : :
::
客:
..
......
公元1972年,中央批准修建从格尔木到拉萨的输油管道。
In 1972, the Central Government approved the construction of a petro-
leum pipeline from Golmud to Lhasa.
公元1975年,中国登山队再次从北坡登上珠穆朗玛峰。以华国锋
为团长的中央代表团到西藏祝贺西藏自治区成立十周年。
In 1975, the Chinese Mountaineering Team once again reached Jo-mo-
glang-ma Peak from the northern slope. The Central Delegation,
headed by Hua Guofeng, arrived in Tibet to congratulate the tenth an-
niversary of the establishment of the Tibet Autonomous Region.
公元1976年,滇藏公路建成通车。
In 1976, Yunnan-Tibet Road was completed and open to traffic.

公元1978年,羊八井地热电站建成。
In 1978, Yangs-pa-can Terrestrial Heat Power Station was completed.

公元1980年,中央召开第一次西藏工作会议,确定了西藏新时期
的工作方针。胡耀邦、万里到西藏进行考察。:suite; .:;: 13:
In 1980, the First Tibet Work Conference was held. The principals for
the new period of Tibet were stipulated. Hu Yaobang and Wan Li took
an.inspection: tolar of Tibet.cc, 1 3 : vising
公元1981年,胡耀邦在北京接见西藏少数民族参观团。羊八井地

热电站开始向拉萨供电。
In 1981, Hu Yaobang received Tibet's Delegation of Minority Nation-
alities in Beijing. Yangs-pa-can Terrestrial Heat Power Station began
to supply electricity to Lhasa.
公元1982年,西藏人口普查,总人口为189.2万人,藏族人口为
187.56万人。
In 1982, the census was conducted in Tibet. The total population was
1. 892 millions, including 1. 8756 million Tibetans. Fo ..

公元1984年,中央召开第二次西藏工作会议。决定由九省市帮助
西藏建设四十三项中小型工程项目,至1985年全部竣工。拉萨卫
星通讯地面站建立。
In 1984, the Second Tibet Work Conference was held. According to
its decision, nine provinces and cities would undertake 43 small-scale
projects aiding Tibet, and all of them would be finished by 1985.
Lhasa Satellite Telecommunications Ground Station was set up: : :

公元1985年,中央批准修建羊卓雍湖水电站。西藏大学、西藏佛
学院及西藏电视台成立。由胡启立率领的中央代表团参加在拉萨
举行的西藏自治区成立二十周年的庆祝活动。
In 1985, the Central Government approved the construction of Yar-
vbrog-gºyu-mtsho Power Station, Tibet University, Tibet Buddhist Col-
lege and Tibet TV Station were officially set up. The Central Delega-
tion, led by Hu Qili, attended the celebrations of the twentieth anni-
versary of the establishment of the Tibet Autonomous Region in Lhasa.

公元1986年,第十世班禅到西藏主持拉萨祈禱大法会。..
In 1986, the Tenth Panchen left for Tibet and presided over the Grand
Prayer Ceremony there.

公元1987年,拉萨发生少数分裂主义分子进行骚乱的严重事件。
In 1987, a small number of separatists started a serious accident in
Lhasa. ... .

公元1988年,班禅东陵扎什南捷在日喀则扎什伦布寺重建竣工。
In 1988, the reconstruction of bKra-shis-ram-rgyal, Panchen's East
Hall in bKra-shis-lhun-po Monastery in Shigatze, was completed.

公元1989年,1月28日第十世班禅大师在扎什伦布寺圆寂。布
达拉宫大规模维修动工。
On January 28 of 1989, the Tenth Panchen Lama passed away in
bKra-shis-lhun-po Monastery. A large-scale maintenance of the Potala
Palace started.

公元1990年,中共中央总书记江泽民到西藏考察。 ::....
In 1990, Jiang Zemin, general secretary of the Central Committee of
the Communist Party of China, had an inspection of Tibet.
公元1991年,拉萨各界隆重集会纪念西藏和平解放四十周年。内
地二十六个省市开办西藏中学和西藏班。
In 1991, masses of all walks of life held a solemn meeting to celebrate
the fortieth anniversary of the peaceful liberation of Tibet Tibet Mid-
dle Schools and Tibet Classes were set up in 26 provinces and cities in
the hinterland of China.
公元1992年,援助西藏发展基金会在北京成立。十七世噶玛巴活
佛在楚布寺认定坐床。
In 1992, Tibet Development Fund was founded in Beijing. The Sev-
enteenth Karmapa Rin-po-che was confirmed and enthroned in
mTshur-phu Monastery.
709



藏大事年表
公元1993年,第十世班禅大师灵塔祀殿在日喀则扎什伦布寺落成
开 光。.. .::..::.… ...
.::. ....: : ::
In 1993, the Tenth Panchen’s reliquary Stupa was completed and con-
secrated in bKra-shis-lhun-po Monastery, Shigatze.
公元1994年,大昭寺维修工程通过验收。第三次西藏工作会议在
北京召开。
In 1994, the maintenance of Jo-khang Temple passed the acceptance
examination. The Third Tibet Work Conference was held in Beijing.
aman目。。。。。。。。
公元1996年,
第十世班禅转世灵童认定的金瓶掣签在大昭寺进
行。中央政府批准经擊签认定的坚赞诺布为十一世班禅。十一世
班禅的坐床大典在扎什伦布寺举行。
In 1996, the Tenth Panchen’s reincarnated soul boy was confirmed
through the method of drawing lots from a gold urn in Jo-khang Tem-
ple. The Central Government approved rGyal-mtshan-nor-bu as the E-
leventh Panchen. The enthronement ceremony of the Eleventh Pan-
chen was held in bKra-shis-lhun-po Monastery.

公元1997年,历时四年零五月的甘丹寺维修工程竣工。第六世热
振 增晋美圆寂。.::
:::
:
In 1997, the maintenance of dGav-ldan Monastery was completed
(which lasted 4 years and 5 months). The Sixth Rwa-sgreng Hutuktu
bsTan-vdzin-vjigs-med passed away.

公元1998年,国务院正式批准世界最大峡谷科学正名为“雅鲁藏
布大峡谷”。
In 1998, the State Council officially approved to give a scientific name
to the largest canyon in the world as “Yar-klung-gtsang-po Grand
Canyon".

西藏大事年表
公元1999年,西藏平叛和民主改革四十周年。十世班禅额尔德尼
圆寂十周年。西藏登山探险队从珠穆朗玛峰峰顶采集到第六届全
国民运会火种。 : ::: . .
The year of 1999 is the forties anniversary of the putting down the re-
bellions and the peaceful liberation of Tibet, and also the tenth anni-
versary of the Tenth Panchen's death. Tibetan Mountaineering Team
collected the sacred flames on Jo-mo-glang-ma Peak for the Sixth Na-
tional Sports. Meetail:51:
3
2 : 31
-. ..”一
公元2000年,藏北嘉黎县的索朗平措被正式认定为第六世热振活
佛的转世灵童,并在大昭寺觉卧佛像前坐床、制度,取法名。
In 2000, bSod-nams-phun-tshogs from Lha-ri County, north of Tibet,
was officially confirmed as the Sixth Rwa-sgreng Hutuktu's reincarnat-
ed soul boy. He was enthroned in front of the statue of Jo-bo in Jo-
khang Temple, and then was tonsured and given a religious title.

公元2001年,青藏铁路新线格尔本至拉萨段正式批准立项。西藏
和平解放五十周年。第四次西藏工作会议召开。
In 2001, the section from Golmud to Lhasa along Qinghai-Tibet Rail-
way was approved for construction. The year of 2001 is the fiftieth an-
niversary of the peaceful liberation of Tibet. The Fourth Tibet Work
Conference was held.

公元2002年,国家拨款的西藏三大古迹布达拉宫、罗布林卡、萨迦
寺维修工程开工。
In 2002, by the State appropriations, the maintenance projects of
three ancient sites in Tibet (the Potala Palace, Nor-bu-gling-ka and
Sa-skya Monastery) started.
||||| |||
公元2004年,中国西藏文化保护与发展协会在北京正式成立。
In 2004, China Association for Preservation and Development of Ti-

年。青藏铁路全线铺轨完成。
The year of 2005 A. D is the tenth anniversary of the Eleventh
Panchen's enthronement and the fortieth anniversary of the establish-
ment of the Tibet Autonomous Region. The work of laying the railway
track along Qinghai-Tibet Railway was completely finished.
公元2006年,青藏铁路开通运营。.. . ...

陈观胜、安才旦主编:《常见藏语人名地名词典》,外文出
版社,2004年版。
.. 夏征农主编:《辞海》,上海辞书出版社,2002年版。
吴汝钩编著:《佛教大辞典》,商务印书馆国际有限公司,
1992年版。
林忠亿编:《佛学名词中英巴梵汇集》,财团法人台北市慧
炬出版社,民国79年(1990年)版。
冯蒸著:《国外西藏研究概况》,中国社会科学出版社,1979
年版。
《汉传佛教词汇字典》,伦敦科根·保罗有限公司
向红编著;《汉英·英汉藏学词汇》,外文出版社,1997
中
,以中火,
起火地
年版。
《朗文英汉双解词典》,外语教学与研究出版社,2002年版。
曾国庆、郭卫平编著:《历代藏族名人传》,西藏人民出版
社,1996年版。
秦永章著:《日本涉藏史》,中国藏学出版社,2005年版。
武振华、国家测绘局地名研究所编著:《西藏地名》,中国
藏学出版社,1996年版。

社、浙江人民出版社,1998年版。
